title: Утро ТНТ
overview: TNT TV channel is reinventing the format of the morning program. Every morning on weekdays from 7 to 9 a.m., the audience will be greeted by presenters Anna Khilkevich and Anatoly Tsoi, as well as their guests. The project "MORNING. TNT is designed to become the most useful and modern morning on Russian television, because it will reflect all current and popular trends, topics and agendas. TNT will create a unique mix of television and digital, in which there will be a place for both TV masters and fresh faces. Communication with guests, capacious and modern headings, riles, shorts and telegram posts in a new format – all this is "MORNING. TNT."The leading columns in the new show will be writer and journalist Sergey Minaev, psychotherapist Andrey Kurpatov, chef Mirko Dzago, powerlifter and world record holder Kirill Sarychev, oncologist Alexander Dzidzaria and many others.
